definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: On one of many cold frosty nights, I shut my caravan door behind me and took a step out into the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 在一个寒冷的霜夜，我关上房车的门，慢慢步入黑暗。

sentences.english: I like to rent an automatic sedan.
sentences.chinese: 我想租一部自排的四门房车。

sentences.english: They are touring in New England with a caravan.
sentences.chinese: 他们正开着房车在新英格兰旅行。

sentences.english: He said that domestic makers get around the regulations by making their RVs shorter.
sentences.chinese: 他说，国内厂商围绕法规获得通过使他们的房车短。

sentences.english: " Replace "your" old car vinyl surface with new fabric.
sentences.chinese: 更换您的破旧棚房车乙烯基面料与一个新的。

sentences.english: We pull into the town’s one RV park.
sentences.chinese: 我们慢慢开进小镇的一个房车停靠点。

definition: racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
